definition: a punctuation mark (-) used between parts of a compound word or between the syllables of a word when the word is divided at the end of a line of text, divide or connect with a hyphen
details:
noun
- a punctuation mark (-) used between parts of a compound word or between the syllables of a word when the word is divided at the end of a line of text
= synonyms: dash
verb
- divide or connect with a hyphen
= example: divide or connect with a hyphen
= synonyms: hyphenate
